title.description: The title of the test (e.g., 'Derivatives and anti-derivatives').

set.description: Which set of tests this one belongs to (e.g., 'Homework', 'Practice Quiz').

number.description: The number of this test within the set (e.g., 1, 2, 3).

options.description: Options that define how the test will work, specific to the individual test type.
